intents: Opens the app\'s statistics section to view summarized sleep data and averages.
Starts a new sleep session by initiating the app\'s sleep tracking after a brief delay.
Sets the sleep report duration filter to display data from the last month in the app\'s settings.
Deletes all recorded sleep entries after user confirmation, effectively clearing the entire sleep history.
intent_summary: The assistant helps users track sleep, view and filter sleep statistics, and delete all recorded sleep data.
